text: if with their whole heart and soul they turn back to you in the land of their enemies who took them captive, and pray to you toward the land you gave their ancestors, the city you have chosen, and the house I have built for your name,
He said to her, “Daughter, your faith has saved you; go in peace.”
The Jews answered and said to him, “Are we not right in saying that you are a Samaritan and are possessed?”
